strapiPost.title: Fresh Air
strapiPost.content:
In a report released earlier this year, Northwest Arkansas ranked as having some of the most clean air in the US. 

  • Zoom in: The Fayetteville metro area had no unhealthy air quality days in regard to ozone pollution and short-term particle pollution. The region's year-round particle pollution levels were in the national standards. 
  • Zoom out: The American Lung Associationâ€™s 2021 State of the Air report, which covers 2017-2019, reveals that more than 4/10 people lived with polluted air, which is getting worse due to climate change.

Learn more about Northwest Arkansas's State of the Air HERE.
